action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a series of colorful shapes arranged in a grid-like pattern. The shapes include a green plus sign, a green inverted T shape, a pink inverted T shape, and an orange L shape. The background is white.

Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image is a pixelated representation of a cross, with a green plus sign in the center, surrounded by various shapes and colors. The cross is made up of a green plus sign in the center, with a green square to the left, a green triangle to the right, a pink square above, and an orange square below. The background is white.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image shows a series of colorful shapes arranged in a grid-like pattern. The shapes include a green plus sign, a green inverted T shape, a pink inverted T shape, and an orange L shape. The background is white.
